def missing_number_percent_column(df,column):
  total = df[column].value_counts(dropna=False)
  percent = df[column].value_counts(dropna=False,normalize=True).round(4) * 100
  res = pd.concat([total, percent], axis = 1,keys= ['Total', 'Percent'])
  return res
